content: 20 single_crochet in each st around 22-23 single_crochet in each st around 24 decrease 13 single_crochet= 14 25-27 single_crochet in each st around 28 5 single_crochet decrease x 2= 12 stop stuffing the legs 29-31 single_crochet in each st around 32 4 single_crochet decrease x 2= 10 33-35 single_crochet in each st around f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 7 beard optional with color e 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 single_crochet increase x 3= 9 3 2 single_crochet increase x 3= 12 4 single_crochet in each st around do not stuff the beard 5 3 single_crochet increase x 3= 15 6 4 single_crochet increase x 3= 18 7 single_crochet in each st around 8 5 single_crochet increase x 3= 21 9 6 single_crochet increase x 3= 24 10 7 single_crochet increase x 3= 27 11-12 single_crochet in each st around 13 8 single_crochet increase x 3= 30 14-16 single_crochet in each st around fold the beard in half and single_crochet the opening closed sweet oddity art 8 assembly head and body 1 if you crocheted the beard place the beard approximately between rounds 27 and 28 of the body sew the beard onto the face 2 if you want the brushed beard look attach a row of double stranded yarn approximately between rounds 27 and 28 you will want 18 strands of white yarn cut approximately 6 inches in length make one row then repeat 2 more row underneath that first row brush the yarn out with a wire pet brush you will lose a lot of yarn during this process sweet oddity art 9 sweet oddity art 10 nose 1 pin the nose above your beard 2 sew the nose onto the body sweet oddity art 11 hat 1 pin the hat onto the head going around the nose 2 sew the hat onto the head but not onto the nose sweet oddity art 12 arms 1 pin the arms onto the side of the body 2 sew the arms onto the body legs 1 turn the body upside down and pin the legs onto the bottom of the body 2 sew the legs onto the body sweet oddity art 13 you now have your finished gnome thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished gnome with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet oddity art 14 cluster stitch begin a double_crochet in the proper stitch yarn over and pull through so that you have 4 loops on your hook in the next movement only take off the first 2 loops sweet oddity art 15 continue to start 3 more double crochets in the same stitch only taking off the first 2 loops on the hook as you go placing them together will make them bunch or puff keep track of
